quality.justification: The model did not follow any of the steps in the plan. It simply returned an error message about a missing LLM provider. The response is somewhat clear in communicating the error, but does not adhere to the instructions at all or make any attempt to complete the task.

response:
I am having trouble thinking right now. Error: litellm.BadRequestError: LLM Provider NOT provided. Pass in the LLM provider you are trying to call. You passed model=mistralai/mistral-small
